sentences.sContent: Why did she kill her husband?
Murray held a gun to his head and threatened to kill him.
sentences.sCn: 默里拿枪指着他的头并威胁要杀了他。

sentences.sContent: Four people were killed when a train plunged into a flooded river.
sentences.sCn: 火车冲进洪水泛滥的河中，造成四人身亡。
漂白剂能够杀灭日常病菌。

sentences.sContent: The out-of-town shopping centre will kill local trade.
sentences.sCn: 城外的购物中心将令本地商业难以为继。

sentences.sContent: With time to kill, he took a cab to the centre.
sentences.sCn: 还有点时间可以消磨，于是他叫了一辆出租车去市中心。

sentences.sContent: ...it will not survive childhood curiosity is a collaboration between child The surest way to kill it is to leave it alone...

phrases.pCn: 自杀；竭尽全力；尽最大努力
◎(医药)要么断送生命，要么挽救生命

words.tran: 杀害的；迷人的；使人筋疲力尽的
杀手；致死；止痛药；宰杀的器具；断路器

trans.tranOther: to make a person or animal die
